DOC.brief_summary: To examine influence compression garment manufacture Far-Infrared technology exercise performance repeat eccentric isokinetic muscle action leg extensor .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Compression Garments Exercise Performance Following Acute High Intensity Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: Participants : Eighty recreationally active ( 1-5 hr per week ) healthy participant age 18 - 35 visit Neuromuscular Research Laboratory 6 separate occasion , 4 occasion also require visit Health service blood draw . Procedures ( method ) : During pre-screening , participant complete inform consent document , health history questionnaire , stature body mass assess . A familiarization session conduct separate day participant practice strength assessment , eccentric isokinetic protocol , ultrasound assessment . Participants assign 1 4 treatment group base initial maximal isometric strength value use matched-participants design . The first experimental session begin 2-10 day later , participant perform repeat eccentric exercise protocol ( 10 set 15 eccentric contraction 210 deg/sec 3 min rest set ) non-dominant leg follow 60 min rest period wear apparel perform 5 min warm-up cycle ergometer . Follow-up blood draw strength ultrasound assessment obtain 24 48 hour post-exercise . Each participant also complete visual analog scale baseline , 24 , 48 , 72 hour post-exercise examine perceive muscle soreness .
DOC.criteria: Cohort Adult Males & Females Participant age 1835 Healthy , Recreationally Active ( 15 hour per week ) Participant provide write date informed consent participate study Participant apparently healthy free disease , determine health history questionnaire Participant agree abstain smoking , caffeine ( 4hrs prior ) , tobacco ( 24hrs prior ) , alcohol ( 24 hr ) test day Participant agree abstain exercise 24 hour prior test visit 72 hour induce exercise damage Participant refrain use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) protein supplementation 24 hour exercise test protocol , well 72 hour period follow exercise test protocol . Participant use , use one follow dietary supplement within 12 week prior enrollment : betaalanine , creatine , taurine , supplemental antioxidant ( Acai , pomegranate , beet juice ) . Participant , participate another clinical trial within 6 week prior enrollment Participant know allergy sensitivity test product ( determined health history questionnaire consent form )
